content:
On March 26, the rocket strike in the Shevchenkivskyi district of Kharkiv on March 26, Russian troops, were caused by a winged X-35U missile.

About thisreportedOffice of the Prosecutor General.

According to the investigation, on March 26 at about 11:30 the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation caused a blow that damaged a non -residential building. In the high -rise building windows are knocked out, there is damage to the facade.

A 64-year-old peaceful resident received an acute response to stress.

According to preliminary data, the blow was caused by a winged X-35U missile. It is a Soviet Russian turbojet ribbed winged anti -ship rocket.

It can be launched from aircraft, helicopters, surface ships and coastal mobile missile systems. Designed for the destruction of ships up to 5000 tons.

Under the procedural guidance of the Shevchenkivska and Slobid district prosecutor's office of Kharkiv and Chuguev District Prosecutor's Office of Kharkiv region, pre -trial investigations on the facts of violation of the laws and customs of war (Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine) were initiated.
title: The occupiers have hit Kharkiv anti-ship missile X-35U today
description: This was reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. According to the investigation, March 26 is about ...
author: Army Inform
